channel.title: * In need of help
channel.description:
Okay, I need help with changing the exp you get when training on dummies & whatever else you train on to recieve exp.
What i'm actually after is someone to tell me or point me in the direction of where I can edit the exp given.
It'll be great if anyone could help. :)
~Chris

item.title: * In need of help
item.dc:creator: @Tbh_I_Own Tbh I Own
item.description:
@Tbh_I_Own wrote:

[quote="†™, post:12, topic:155370"]Yep but you’ll find most people use npc’s as a training ground lately, due to the massers, now that idk how to edit the exp so you get more, so dont ask me for help on that

and NP[/quote]

I’m after less exp.

My server is currently 9 clicks for a skill to be 99.

I want it to be somewhere around 60-70 clicks - Otherwise it’s pointless - i’m also slowly adding NPC’s to train on.

And don’t worry, I won’t ask for help.

Thanks!

Read full topic

item.title: * In need of help
item.dc:creator: @Tbh_I_Own Tbh I Own
item.description:
@Tbh_I_Own wrote:

[quote="†™, post:9, topic:155370"]Right…
addSkillXP(50000*playerLevel[3], 3);

the 50000 is the exp you get, the 3], 3 is the skill you are training up like it says

	addSkillXP(50000*playerLevel[0], 0); //Adds 30 XP to Attack
	addSkillXP(50000*playerLevel[3], 3); //Adds 8 XP to Hit Points

hope this helps ;)[/quote]

Thanks a lot!

If I change to

addSkillXP(2000*playerLevel[0], 0); //Adds 30 XP to Attack

That’ll give 2k exp i’m presuming?

Thanks for your time & help.

Read full topic

item.title: * In need of help
item.description:
@11131 wrote:

Right…
addSkillXP(50000*playerLevel[3], 3);

the 50000 is the exp you get, the 3], 3 is the skill you are training up like it says

	addSkillXP(50000*playerLevel[0], 0); //Adds 30 XP to Attack
	addSkillXP(50000*playerLevel[3], 3); //Adds 8 XP to Hit Points

hope this helps

item.title: * In need of help
item.dc:creator: @Tbh_I_Own Tbh I Own
item.description:
@Tbh_I_Own wrote:

Oh! I see!

Okay, bare with me; i’ll edit when I find!

[code]case 823: //Dummy object ID

if (actionTimer == 0) { //If the timer has gone down to 0

sendMessage("You receive some attack xp."); //Sends the msg "You hit the dummy and recieve Attack XP!"
setAnimation(0x326); //Hit animation
addSkillXP(50000*playerLevel[0], 0); //Adds 30 XP to Attack
addSkillXP(50000*playerLevel[3], 3); //Adds 8 XP to Hit Points
updateRequired = true; //Adds an update
appearanceUpdateRequired = true; //Update to apprearance

}[/code]

I’m guessing it’s something to do with:

[code]
addSkillXP(50000playerLevel[0], 0);
addSkillXP(50000playerLevel[3], 3);/code]

If it is, anyway you can explain what is meant by 50000*playerlevel[0], 3);?
I mean, what exp is that per click?[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: * In need of help
item.dc:creator: @Tbh_I_Own Tbh I Own
item.description:
@Tbh_I_Own wrote:

case 1: // Strength refreshSkills(); sendFrame164(6206); stillgfx(199, absX, absY); sendFrame126("Congratulations, you just advanced a strength level!", 6207); sendFrame126("Your strength level is now "+playerLevel[2]+" .", 6208); sendMessage("Congratulations, you just advanced a strength level.");

Am I in the correct place?

I have no idea what to do, but i’m sure i’ll get there soon with your help!

item.title: * In need of help
item.description:
@11131 wrote:

cough
Well its simple, just search up the words it says like “i just gained atk exp!” thats just an example then underneath that or above i think above it should say some number like 1500 example again

or you could search the objects ID number

should usally be case item id here

If this doesnt help then ill load my client up and say what exactly to search for in example

OH YEAH, search in client.java

Read full topic

item.title: * In need of help
item.dc:creator: @supra_s supra s
item.description:
@supra_s wrote:

most of the time you could open up your client.java
press ctrl F

end enter Train
after a while you will see case …: training on object blablabla
en under that you will see somting from XP change it there
